commitResults.messageTitle: Level-3. Added task class. Added ability to cross out done tasks on the list and changed list print format. Changed createList() and printList() methods to use Task class instead.
Added option to choose either echo and list. Added more responses from duke.
Add List class, rewrite main class to use List
commitResults.messageBody:
Added the list class for more object-oriented code.
General cleaning up of the main Class and re-written to make use of the
List class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for Todo, Deadline, Event tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Added the Todo, Deadline and Event classes, allowing the user to
differentiate the different kinds of tasks to add to the list.

Added automated testing for command line UI.
Moved creation of scanner object out of the loop in main() so that it
only gets created once. Originally was inside the getUserInput() method,
causing it to be created every loop. This caused the automated testing
to only read one line of the input.txt file.

Slight modifications to List, Deadline and Event classes to account for
the extra " " between the task description and "/by" or "/at".
Added cleaner exception handling using try-catch.

Edited automatic testing input.txt to test a few of the exceptions.
Changed expected.txt to reflect changes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Move try-catch for executing commands from main() to executeCommand()
commitResults.messageBody:
Moved the handling of exceptions while executing commands in the
executeCommand() method to be handled within the method instead of
throwing to main() and handling in main()
A-Packages. Packages all classes into packages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add exception for invalid DONE command
commitResults.messageBody:
Added a catch statement to catch when the user inputs a done command
with an entry number that does not exist in the current list, causing
a null pointer exception

Added the delete task function, changed List class to use ArrayList<>
instead of an array to store tasks.
Second input file for automated testing

commitResults.messageTitle: Add exception handling for delete command
commitResults.messageBody:
-Added exception handling for the delete command.
-Refactored execute done, delete and task commands into their own method
-Moved exception handling for missing /by and /at modifier to be handled
 by the executeTaskCommand() method in Duke class instead of List class
-Edited input.txt and expected.txt to test more exceptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Add saving and reading data from .txt file
commitResults.messageBody:
Added FileManager class to handle reading and writing into a separate
text file. The data will write when a bye command is used, and load
data whenever Duke is run.

Added the save command which saves the data into a separate text file.
Previously this was only done when the "bye" command was used to end
the program.
Added the clearsave command, which clears the saved data.
Renamed getDataFromFile() in List class to addEntryFromFile() as this
more accurately reflects the functionality
Removed and replaced few magic ints related to loading saved data.
Removed dukeData.txt from being tracked by git.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix file saving for JAR files
commitResults.messageBody:
Fixed the bug where the program would not save the data if run from a
JAR file in a folder with no "Data" directory. Now the "Data" directory
will be created if it does not already exist.
Added a check if there is existing data when the program starts. If no
data exists, no message will be printed. Previously, as the program
tried to load data anyway, it would not be able to find a save file and
would print an error message.

Removed the instantiation of the FileManager class as it is a utility
class. Without the instantiation, the filePath static variable has to be
first set by the setPath() method.

Added the Ui and Storage classes and refactored methods from duke class
to the new classes. Ui class will be for printing and dealing with user
inputs. Storage class will be for dealing with the save file.
Renamed List class to TaskList

Added the abstract Command class, which has an executeCommand method.
All command types are inherited from this class, and have their own
execution. Changed the access of a some methods from TaskList and
Storage to public to allow Command class access

Refactor Duke class, miscellaneous cleanup. Removed wildcard import.
Changed Storage class to require instantiation.

Added the parser class. Used to obtain information from String inputs
for creating new entries in the list.
Moved parsing methods from TaskList class to the new Parser class.
Removed extra spaces in the welcome message

commitResults.messageTitle: Add capability of recognising date and time
commitResults.messageBody:
Added capability to recognise and utilist date and time using the
LocalDateTime class
Changed how Tasks are saved in the text file to facilitate parsing of
date and time.

Fixed some formatting issues according to feedback from github.
Added executeCommand() for ByeCommand class.
Added more javadoc comments.

Added the date command. Allows the user to see all the tasks that are
related to a certain date. Either deadlines or events.
Command is in the form date yyyy-mm-dd.

Added the search command used as "search searchterm",
which shows the user all list entries which contain the searchterm.
